text: @piersmorgan We must united! A bad person like #cummmings is by far more dangerous than #COVID19 We cannot let one man damage the value of United Kingdom, and we cannot let @BorisJohnson turn UK into China or North Korea. UK can have different views on politics but must have fair and justice.
